casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Adam Robert JACKSON 397A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 20, 2017 Danielle Blass, Attorney at Law, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Southport, for Jackson, Adam Robert. Joseph A. Newsome, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Southport, Jillian C. Katz, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Jackson, Adam Robert

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of January 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of January 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 3rd day of March 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
